runs.comm: slightly back of a length, around the line of off, White goes back and across and defends with a straight bat
shortish, touch more width, White jabs at it and squirts the ball in front of point, Morgan stops it well to prevent one
cross-seam delivery from Broad, Finch pushes it on the full wide of short extra cover for a single
on the stumps, worked back past the bowler, mid-on moves across to his left
on the stumps, worked off the legs through square
good length, outside the line and Finch guides it into the covers
and he starts with a wide, firing this narrowly down the leg side
pitched up, wide enough to get White's dander up, but he miscues and thick inside edge into his pads
angled in, slightly full again, clipped firmly to leg where Bresnan makes a diving stop at midwicket
on the stumps and flicked behind square this time, Dernbach makes a bit of a meal of stopping it at fine leg
digs this in short and White takes it on, pulling aerially down towards Dernbach, who can't make up the ground and settles for making a goalie stop on the bounce
length ball, nips back a touch and rattles into the pads, might have been some bat involved, height an issue too
Finch backs away and Jordan follows him, sends a length ball zipping through past a swing and a miss - decent first over from Jordan
length ball, tight line around off, tapped short on the off side
you beauty! That's a shot from White, driven crisply, furiously even, on the up and straight back past Broad for the first boundary. Wasn't overpitched but took some punishment
goes again, this time on the pull, Broad dropping short and being carted high over midwicket - he's up and running now
length in the channel, stays back and opens the face to run one to third man
punches a length ball down the ground, just one as mid-on and mid-off converge
ripper from Broad, beats the batsman for pace as the ball zips through off the pitch
Jordan tries the chin music on Finch, whose swats it away at chest height, loopy pull shot but it bounces away to the rope
this was slightly more ungainly (less gainly?), as Finch makes room and swings wildly at a short ball that bounces over the stumps
short and at the batsman, pulled flat through midwicket, there's a fielder out there now
down the leg side, there's a scrape of something - most likely pad - and Buttler then takes a terrific low catch diving to his left. Saved a leg bye, he did
fires the ball in full at White's feet as he wanders to leg, deflects away square
full, attempted yorker, nearly catches Finch out, he swipes an inside edge to deep square leg
good length on the stumps, blocked watchfully
pulled, not out of the middle, straight to midwicket but dropped by Jordan! Maybe I spoke too soon... It flew fairly quickly, such is Finch's power, but should have been taken, around head height
seams back a touch and cramps Whites for room, hitting him near the bread basket
on the stumps, worked back on the leg side, Jordan scampers in to field
tight line outside off from Bresnan, an inside edge bobbles short on the off side and they get one
opens the face and runs a single to short third man
starts well, length ball on off stump, tapped into the off side

clubbed over deep backward square, that's a monstrous flick from Finch, the first six of the innings! He came forward out of the crease, made the delivery a half-volley on his pads, but the nonchalance with which he launched the ball over the rope was astounding
on leg stump, worked through square leg for a couple more
good pace, around off stump, Finch has a big old ballyhoo and fails to connect
six more, into the crowd at long-on! Overptiched from Stokes and he's taken downtown by the little big man again, crrrrrrrrrrrrunched back over his head
shortens his length wisely, outside off, guides the ball straight to short third man
length outside off, White attacks but can't replicate Finch's hitting, skewing a thick edge to third man on the bounce

here goes Finch again - he loves playing against England - carting a slightly fill ball out towards wide long-on, Hales gets round to it but appeared uncertain where the boundary was and compounds his drop but sending it beyond the rope. Tough but takeable
on the stumps, played respectfully back this time

on the attack, doesn't get hold of a pull and plops the ball to mid-on! England have got their aggressor, Bresnan winkles him out with a half-tracker, miscalculation from Finch, who tried to pull from outside off, maybe wasn't quite short enough either and spooned to the fielder
full and down the leg side, squirts it through square leg to get off the mark
tight stuff from Bresnan, on off stump and tickled down the ground for one more
good length outside off, White swings and misses
low full toss on the stumps, clipped low through the leg side to deep midwicket
pitched up wide of the wicket, Maxwell fiddles at it and fails to connect
spears this down the leg side - wide
brutal, Maxwell smears a flat six over wide long-off! Maybe a touch full from Stokes and Maxwell backed away to smoke it into the crowd
takes the pace off and the ball bounces over the stumps as Maxwell walks across and attempts a cute dab behind square
back of a length, outside off, smacked down the ground with a baseball slug but straight to long-on
boom, six more! Broad goes short and follows Maxwell, who simply roundhouses it on its way over deep backward square

swings again but Maxwell has holed out to long-on! The ball was back of a length, Maxwell tried to cross-batter it again, came high off the bat and straight to the man running in from the fence. Another frenzied failure from Maxwell
leg-stump line, closes the face and works one to backward square leg
goes back and runs a couple down to third man
tries to dab the ball to the same part of the ground and it's cut off on the edge of the ring, Lumb the substitute, he has a shy with Cutting stranded but fails to hit!
launches into a length ball and sends it high, high, high and just beyond the boundary at long-on. Told you
starts with a length ball on the stumps, White gets behind the line
fuller, in the channel, driven through the covers for a couple into the deep
good line, White pushes into the off side, cut off in the circle
now the slower ball from Dernbach, out the back of the hand, White watches it on to the bat around leg stump and steers one through square
length ball outside the line of off, opens the face and guides one to third man
full and straight, right up in the blockhole, White bunts one to long-on - not bad, Jade, not bad
full ball on the stumps, swung into the leg side, powerful strike and runs to the fence
slower ball on leg stump, flicked very fine and it skips away for four more
Bresnan drags his length back and gets punched down to long-on
length ball and heaved over the longest part of the ground, big smash right across the line and nailed it into the stands
lovely timed straight drive but it cannons the bowler's end stumps and ricochets into midwicket for a couple
excellent yorker, dug out down to long-off
short ball pulled out to deep midwicket
length delivery, slower ball on the stumps, turned carefully to the leg side 45 and they get a quick single
full but well wide of off stump, 100 up
excellent quick yorker and Cutting is hurried into digging out the toe-crusher
full length swung hard down the ground, Root sliding to his left at long-on misses, perhaps could have done better there
slower ball on leg stump and Cutting seems to nudge around the corner but ends up shovelling it off his elbow to the 45
full outside off, big swing and a miss
length on the stumps, White clears the front leg and extends the arms through the shot, creaming it over long-off
forward and angling to short third man, too quickly for a single
full length angled in, pushed firmly down to long-off
length ball, Cutting opens up to swing it to leg but misses
full on the stumps, another lovely swing down the ground, clears long-off this time, managed to play it inside out against the angle, sweetly timed
back of a length, goes to uppercut but misses completely
around the wicket, flicked out to deep midwicket for an easy single

down the track, punches firmly back towards the bowler but Root reaches out to his left and clings onto a rifling chance that was struck very well but evidently too straight and Root intervened to perfect effect
down the track, goes to flick to leg but gets struck on the thigh pad
another step down the wicket, this time picks it up over the leg side and places it perfectly in between deep midwicket and long-on
now smashes off side and Jordan has to run to his left to field, does well
another step down and hits this off a length over long-on, cracking timing again

full down the leg side, White flicks at it, there's a polite enquiry and it's given out! The slightest of edges according to Snicko but that a very good decision from the umpire. Innocent little flash down the leg side and Jordan has picked up a cheap wicket
cut stroke to backward point, the throw - for some reason - comes into the bowler's end and there's no-one covering so they get a buzzard to long-on
bumper, Bailey swats it from over his head to deep square leg
slightly short of a length outside off, cut stroke takes a huge inside edge and it narrowly evades  the stumps but evades Buttler's dive too
full ball angled in, takes the pad and they get a quick leg bye
another angled in delivery, this time takes the pad and doesn't run away
full delivery on off stump, blocked back up the wicket
cutter on the stumps, Hodge looks to turn it to leg but gets an edge up the wicket
short ball, pulled to the deep square leg, one of three men out deep in the leg side, hard running brings two, well done 39-year-old

short again but this time pulled straight to long leg where Dernbach doesn't have to move to take it at head height, solid catch and the short ball works this time, the shot was pretty firmly struck but he picked out the fielder with perfection
full length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler

full length, nips back a little, Christian pokes at it in the crease, and gets a thick inside edge that takes middle stump another wicket for England who are just coming back into this. Very poor footwork, i.e. none, from Christian
short ball, swatted down into midwicket and it's just a single, exactly what England wanted
full on leg stump, flicked down to long leg
turned into square leg, they sprint hard for two and the throw from Stokes is miles off line so they get home safe as houses
full on off stump, knocked into the covers and they get an easy run
full on the stumps, turned into the leg side and there's another easy single
very full, excellent delivery, turned down to long leg for an easy single
bumper, gets up well over Bailey's head, he uppercuts it down to third man on the bounce
good length, Wade is forward and knocks it into point
full angled in, Bailey steps to leg and pushes into the covers
wide, well down leg

slower ball on the stumps, slogged straight up in the air, it goes miles up and Bopara is the man running in from deep midwicket, he makes the ground but drops the catch with the ball swirling to his right at the last moment, very tough chance
short at the body and hammered behind square, nailed the pull
another pull, this straight to Bopara again but on the bounce
length ball, slower ball, long ball over midwicket, flat and hard, smashed
much fuller and angled to backward point
full on leg stump, clubbed leg side, Bopara comes in to field but can't save two
short ball, pulled without timing, deep-square is in quickly and saves the second
short and pulled from outside off, except he misses completely
full at leg stump, swung towards deep midwicket and they race back for two
short ball outside off and Bailey swings wildly at it, gets it off the toe and finds wide long-on
slower ball bouncer, Bailey steps back and whacks it mid-off and it clears the rope! Amazing shot, what power
slower on the stumps, Bailey swings it hard over the leg side and clears the rope again! Slower ball picked up and it has enough length to carry wide long-on
full and wide of off stump, Bailey reaches out and hammers this wide of deep cover, that almost carried for six as well
length outside off, Bailey swings it away again, this past extra cover and there's enough pace to find the fence again!

full and wide, Bailey has to almost dive across for it, gets a thick outside edge to third man, Wright saves with super dive and throws back to Buttler who manages to miss the stumps with a flick of the hands meaning Bailey got back for the second
